game.title: Free Kitties

features.feature: What does it feel like to wear one? two?

game.description: Free Kitties is a fun crowdfunding campaign spearheaded by Elijah Renard to raise public awareness around transgender issues such as gender dysphoria and lack of visibility, and to get chest reconstruction surgery.

history.text: Elijah Renard is a Canadian game designer, ux designer and pixel art enthusiast. He studied game design at Vancouver Film School (VFS) and designed games for Hasbro and Ubisoft during his time at EA Mobile and Longtail Studios. Elijah is currently working on PlayMC2, a daily tracking mobile platform that rewards people with points and prizes for doing things they care about â€“ making life healthier, happier and more rewarding.
